articles.title: The Toyota Supra Won't Stay Dead For Long - Motor1.com
articles.description: Toyota is hinting at a new Supra, and the company hopes we won't have to wait too long for the next one to arrive.

articles.title: Samsung closed the One UI 8 beta to new users in the US after barely a day - 9to5Google
articles.description: While your results may vary, it looks like Samsung's One UI 8 beta program is already full, barely a day after it opened up.

articles.title: Microsoft releases a bold new update for Notepad - The Verge
articles.description: Microsoft is adding text formatting support to Notepad. You’ll be able to use bold and italic options, alongside hyperlinks and Markdown support.
